item.title: System design
item.author: lechuan2001@gmail.com (Le Chuan)
item.description: Requirements: Imagine you have to design a system for serving blogs to massive readers (10k tps). How would you design the system? Solving: Step 1: Use cases and constraints: Use cases: Who can write a blog ? (anyone or having specific constraints) Reader searches keywords, tags,… Notice to readers for new blogs. … Constraints: Massive readers - 10.000 transaction per second Search should be fast Read heavy or write heavy?
